channel.title: Hdfs on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Hdfs on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] (Translation) Python to Hadoop file system (HDFS) native connection
item.description: In the beginning: Wes McKinney, creator of pandas, wrote a very interesting blog about data tools in Python, so I asked if I could translate it and publish it in the Japanese PyData community. I have received it, so I will translate it little by little and publish it. Source: Native Hadoop file system (HDFS) connectivity in Python 2017/1/3 So far, many Python libraries have been developed to interact with Hadoop File System or HDFS.
